name: XigZag X-Treme
description:
Hi guys.

This is my 1st project made on Unity. This isn't a so well elaborated project and actually it's quite simple. This is a polished version of one fixing exercise made while I was learning some functions of this engine.

In this game the task is simple: control a ball through a line of platforms and collect a minimum of 70 coins before cross the finish line and each level you get through, the speed of the ball increases.

Game Controls:

  • Space: Start/Resume the game and control the direction of the ball;
  • Escape: Pause/Unpause and (in game over) Exit the game;
